entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 17 March 2023
